summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue Southwest from West Andover Street to West Brandon Street; Twenty-third Avenue Southwest from West Spokane Street to West Genesee Street, and West Andover Street from Twenty-sixth Avenue Southwest to Twenty-second Avenue Southwest, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4310 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
